Scripts.OnEnter: if not TMW.Locked then self:SetScript("OnEnter", nil) self.__noWrapTooltipText = true TMW:TT(self, self.GetTooltipTitle, "ICON_TOOLTIP2NEW", 1, nil) self:GetScript("OnEnter")(self) end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if not TMW.Locked then if TMW.ID.isMoving then TMW:Group_StopMoving(TMW.ID.isMoving) end if button == "RightButton" then TMW.IE:Load(nil, self) end TMW.IE:ScheduleIconSetup(self) end
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if not TMW.Locked then local ID = TMW.ID if not ID then return end ID.DraggingInfo = nil ID.F:Hide() ID.IsDragging = nil end

Scripts.OnReceiveDrag: if TMW.ID then TMW.ID:CompleteDrag("OnReceiveDrag", self) TMW.ID:SpellItemToIcon(self) end
Scripts.OnClick: if not TMW.Locked and TMW.ID then TMW.ID:SpellItemToIcon(self) end
